name: COE Car Race
description:
Game created for science outreach by the Centre for Organic Electronics at the University of Newcastle, where you can race electric cars that slowly use up electrical charge.

Typically run with a custom built trailer with two TVs and RFID tags for adding energy. To run the game, press 'p' to begin playing and then energy can be added by pressing numbers 1-4 to each car (if you aren't playing with the trailer). Number 5-8 respawn the vehicles and you can press 'l' to end the race.

Rural Australia assets by Andrew Svanberg Hamilton, car model from dmi-3d.net and sound effects from zapsplat.com.
